title: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (July 20 - August 16) will also receive:

- The new Penaud La Coureuse sports car
- The Auto Shop Car Lift
- The Santo Capra X Manor Suit and Pants
- The Anodized Lime Pearl Chameleon Wheel Paint
- 50% off HSW Conversion costs
- And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
